text:
The 1.2.x branch and trunk do not support compiling on BeOS with VPATH.

On BeOS, @OSDIR@ != @DEFAULT_OSDIR@ and only the build include dir is searched
for the default OS (unix).

This worked fine in the 0.9.x branch.
creator: andreas.faerber@web.de
andreas.faerber@web.de
text:
Created attachment 21475
proposed patch

This path extends the search path by adding the source default OS dir.

Although I got the bug number wrong [marking this blocking so the bug number
ca be decoded from the commit) this is fixed on 1.3 and trunk.

Thanks!
creator: wrowe@apache.org
